decisions.description: Checks that proper information has been provided before closing to avoid triggering Opportunity validation rules: Design_Opps_require_NIR_for_Won STN_Oppty_Fields_for_ClosedWon_required (vendor check only because other fields are required in previous screen)
decisions.name: asn_ClosedWonSTD_VRcheck
decisions.label: Validation Rule Check

rules.name: asn_ClosedWonSTD_VRcheck_Error
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR (2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND (6 OR 7))
rules.label: Error

decisions.description: Determines if the AcctSysDivBillTo is already being used for a Customer Account record that is active
decisions.name: dec_AACBDCINTMEX_AcctSysDivBillTo
decisions.label: AcctSysDivBillTo Found

decisions.description: Determines if the related Account record type is a Prospect or Customer
decisions.name: dec_AcctRT
decisions.label: Account RecordType

decisions.description: Determines the Business Unit ownership associated with the related Prospect Account record, based on user input/confirmation
decisions.name: dec_BusinessUnit

decisions.description: Determines if the Billing Address is complete, or if user has not provided enough information

decisions.description: Determines if the AcctSysDivBillTo is already being used for a Customer Account record that is active
decisions.name: dec_VRTVDom_AcctSysDivBillTo
decisions.label: AcctSysDivBillTo Found

Flow.description: Allows AAC/BDC/INTL/MEX users to enter the proper information when an Opportunity is 'Closed Won.' This will also check if the related Account is a 'Prospect' record type and will convert to a 'Customer' if so. This is because these teams do not currently have an integration with an external customer master system to allow conversion to function the way it does for US accounts.

formulas.description: Concatenates the Legacy System Code + BillTo Number
formulas.name: fx_AccountSysDivBillTo

Flow.label: Opportunity - Closed Won AAC/BDC/INT/MEX

recordCreates.description: Creates a new Customer Account record. The Opportunity Owner is assigned ownership of this new record. Legacy System Code, Legacy Division Code (AAC only), and BillTo Number are applied, based on user inputs.
recordCreates.name: crt_AACBDCINTMEX_BillToFound_CustAcctCreation
recordCreates.label: Customer Account

recordLookups.description: Gets Customer Account records that match the AcctSysDivBillTo
recordLookups.name: get_AcctSysDivBillTo
recordLookups.label: AcctSysDivBillTo for Active Customer

recordLookups.description: Gets the Customer RecordType ID for the Account object
recordLookups.name: get_ConvertAcct_CustAcctRecordTypeId
recordLookups.label: Customer Account RecordTypeId

recordLookups.description: Gets the Opportunity record using the recordId that was passed when invoking the Flow from the 'Close Won' button on the Opportunity page
recordLookups.name: get_Opportunity
recordLookups.label: Opportunity

recordUpdates.description: Updates the related Account to change values and convert to a Customer record type
recordUpdates.name: udt_AACBDCINTMEX_AcctRecordConv
recordUpdates.label: Account Conversion

recordUpdates.description: Updates the Prospect Account record so this can be merged with the Customer Account record at a later date
recordUpdates.name: udt_AACBDCINTMEX_BillToFound_ProspectAcct
recordUpdates.label: Prospect Account

recordUpdates.description: Updates Opportunity that invoked the Flow
recordUpdates.name: udt_Opportunity
recordUpdates.label: Opportunity

screens.description: Screen to notify user that a Customer record was found with a matching AcctSysDivBillTo and the Opportunity will move to this existing record
screens.name: asn_VRTVDom_BillToFound_Notice
screens.label: BillTo Found Notice

fields.name: txt_VRTVDom_BillToFound_Notice
fields.fieldText:
NOTICE

Customer# {!var_AcctDetails_BillToNumber} is already assigned to the Customer record below.

Clicking 'Finish' will move the Opportunity to this Customer record after changing the Status to Closed Won.

screens.description: Screen to notify user that a customer record was found and actions that will take place if moving forward
screens.name: scn_AACBDCINTMEX_BillToFound_Notice
screens.label: BillTo Found Notice

fields.name: txt_AACBDCINTMEX_BillToFound_Notice
fields.fieldText:
NOTICE

Customer# {!var_AcctDetails_BillToNumber} is already assigned to the Customer record below.

Clicking 'Finish' will move the Opportunity to this Customer record after changing the Status to Closed Won.

screens.description: Screen for International Opportunity record types. Users confirms if related Account is US/Domestic owned.
screens.name: scn_ClosedWonINT
screens.label: International Inputs

fields.name: ipt_ClosedWonINT_RelatedAccountVRTVDom
fields.helpText: Confirm if this Opportunity is associated with a US/Domestic owned Account

fields.name: txt_ClosedWonINT_ConvertNotice
fields.fieldText:
NOTICE


The related Prospect Account {!get_Opportunity.Account.Name} will be converted to a Customer Account record after changing this Opportunity Status to Closed Won

fields.name: txt_ClosedWonINT_NewAcctMssg
fields.fieldText:
NOTICE


Because this Opportunity is related to a US/Domestic owned Account, a new International owned Customer Account record will be created. The Opportunity will then move to this new Customer Account record after changing this Opportunity Status to Closed Won.

fields.name: ipt_ClosedWonINT_AcctDetails_AcctAddressError
fields.fieldText: Please complete all Billing Address fields

validationRule.errorMessage: Maximum length is 120 characters
This date can not be prior to the Close Date
This date can not be after to the Expected Billing Date

fields.name: ipt_ClosedWonINT_AcctDetails_BillToNumber
fields.helpText: Will be saved in the 'Bill To Number' field on the Customer Account record

validationRule.errorMessage: Maximum length is 18 characters
Maximum length is 255 characters
Maximum length is 32,000 characters

fields.name: ipt_ClosedWonSTD_BusinessUnit
fields.helpText:
Confirm the Business Unit associated with the related Account:

  • All American Containers
  • Bulkley Dunton
  • Mexico

fields.name: txt_ClosedWonSTD_ConvertNotice
fields.fieldText:
NOTICE


Related Prospect Account {!get_Opportunity.Account.Name} will be converted to a Customer after changing this Opportunity to Closed Won

fields.name: ipt_ClosedWonSTD_AcctDetails_AcctAddressError
fields.fieldText: Please complete all Billing Address fields

validationRule.errorMessage: Maximum length is 120 characters
This date can not be after to the Expected Billing Date
This date can not be prior to the Close Date

fields.name: ipt_ClosedWonSTD_AcctDetails_BillToNumber
fields.helpText: Will be saved in the 'Bill To Number' field on the Customer Account record

validationRule.errorMessage: Maximum length is 18 characters

fields.name: ipt_ClosedWonSTD_OppyDetails_CustomerSellingMarginRate
fields.helpText: Choose your target margin percentage for this opportunity

validationRule.errorMessage: Maximum length is 32,000 characters

fields.name: txt_OppyUpdate_ErrorMessage_Vendor
fields.fieldText: Please add a Vendor to this Opportunity before moving to Closed Won

fields.name: txt_OppyUpdate_ErrorMessage_Design
fields.fieldText: Before you can close a Design opportunity, you must submit an NIR request from the Opportunity
